snippet: This remake of Bill Gunn’s “Ganja and Hess” is a stylishly shot, coolly contemplative homage to the original.
abstract: A O Scott reviews film Da Sweet Blood of Jesus, directed by Spike Lee.
lead_paragraph: This remake of Bill Gunn’s “Ganja and Hess” is a stylishly shot, coolly contemplative homage to the original.

headline.main: Review: ‘Da Sweet Blood of Jesus,’ Spike Lee’s Vampire Movie
headline.print_headline: Laid-Back Vampires Ponder What’s for Lunch
